lead_paragraph: As Congress prepares to get serious on Wednesday about trying to resolve its tax impasse, lawmakers are dealing with what has to be one of the most predictable legislative train wrecks in the history of the House and Senate.
snippet: When they were in college, were members of Congress the type of students who always pulled all-nighters?
abstract: When they were in college, were members of Congress the type of students who always pulled all-nighters?
